settings.editor: The technological revolution is changing aspect of our lives, and the fabric of society itself. it's also changing the way we learn and what we learn. Factual knowledge is less prized when everything you ever need to know can be found on your phone. There's no imperative to be an expert at doing everything when you can.

settings.html:
<style>
    body,html{
        overflow-x: hidden !important;
    }
    
    /* MENU STYLE*/
    
    .jf-menu ul li:nth-child(2) .elementor-icon-list-text{
        border-bottom: 3px solid #fff;
    }
    .jf-menu .elementor-icon-list-text{
        transition: all 0.1s;
    }
    .jf-menu ul li:nth-child(2) .elementor-icon-list-text,.jf-menu .elementor-icon-list-text:hover{
        color: #fff !important;
        font-weight: 600 !important;
        border-bottom: 3px solid #fff;
    }
    
    /*PRODUCT OBJECT STYLE*/
    
    .product-object{
        background: #424246;
        height: 535px;
        width: 650px;
        border-radius: 50px;
        animation: product-animation 5s linear infinite; 
    }
    @keyframes product-animation{
        0%{
            transform: rotate(-10deg);
        }
        50%{
            transform: rotate(-5deg);
        }
        100%{
            transform: rotate(-10deg);
        }
    }
    
    
    /*LOGO OBJECT*/
    
    .logo-object-top{
        animation: logo-object-top 5s linear infinite;
    }
    @keyframes logo-object-top{
        0%{
            margin-left: -5px;
        }
        50%{
            margin-left: 5px;
        }
        100%{
            margin-left: -5px;
        }
    }
    
    .logo-object-top-2{
        animation: logo-object-top-2 10s linear infinite;
    }
    @keyframes logo-object-top-2{
        0%{
            margin-right: -3px;
        }
        50%{
            margin-right: 3px;
        }
        100%{
            margin-right: -3px;
        }
    }
    
    .logo-object-bottom{
        animation: logo-object-bottom 10s linear infinite;
    }
    @keyframes logo-object-bottom{
        0%{
            margin-left: -3px;
        }
        50%{
            margin-left: 3px;
        }
        100%{
            margin-left: -3px;
        }
    }
    
    .logo-object-bottom-2{
        animation: logo-object-bottom-2 5s linear infinite;
    }
    @keyframes logo-object-bottom-2{
        0%{
            margin-right: -3px;
        }
        50%{
            margin-right: 3px;
        }
        100%{
            margin-right: -3px;
        }
    }
    
    
    .icon-card .elementor-icon{
        border: 1px solid #64f4ab;
        border-radius: 50%;
        height: 100px;
        width: 100px;
        padding: 30px;
        background: #2d2e32;
    }
    .icon-card .elementor-widget-container{
        transition: all 0.5s !important;
    }
    .icon-card:hover .elementor-widget-container{
        background-image: linear-gradient(180deg, #64f4ab 0%, #327a56 100%) !important;
    box-shadow: 25px 25px 30px 0 rgba(100, 244, 171, 0.15);
}
    .icon-card:hover .elementor-icon{
        background-image: linear-gradient(180deg, #327a56 0%, #64f4ab 100%) !important;
        color: #fff !important;
    }
.anim{
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}
.zoom{
    transform: scale(0.7);
}
.zoom.added{
    transform: scale(1);
}
.fadeinleft{
    transition: all 0.75s ease-in-out;
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(-200px);
}
.fadeinleft.added{
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0);
}

.fadeinleft.added.ud.down{
    transform: translateX(0);
}
.fadeinleft.added.ud.up{
    transform: translateX(-200px);
}

.rotate{
    transition: all 0.75s ease-in-out;
    transform: rotate(-5deg);
}
.rotate.added{
    /*transform: translateX(0);*/
}

.rotate.added.ud.down{
    transform: rotate(-10deg);
}
.rotate.added.ud.up{
    transform: rotate(-5deg);
}

.fadeinright{
    transition: all 0.75s ease-in-out;
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(100px);
}
.fadeinright.added{
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0);
}
.fadeinright.added.ud.down{
    transform: translateX(0);
}
.fadeinright.added.ud.up{
    transform: translateX(100px);
}
    
/*Responsive*/

/*Responsive*/

@media (max-width: 1350px) {
    .product-object{
        height: 520px;
        width: 48vw;
        
    }
}
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
    .product-object {
    	height: 530px;
    	width: 650px;
    }
}

@media (max-width: 767px) {
    .product-object{
        height: 350px;
        width: 330px;
        border-radius: 25px;
        
    }
}
@media (max-width: 410px) {
    .product-object{
        width: 75vw;
    }
}

</style>
<script src="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.6.0.min.js"></script>
<script>

var $ = jQuery

$.fn.isInViewport = function() {
    var elementTop = $(this).offset().top;
    var elementBottom = elementTop + $(this).outerHeight();

    var viewportTop = $(window).scrollTop();
    var viewportBottom = viewportTop + $(window).height();

    return elementBottom > viewportTop && elementTop < viewportBottom;
};

$(window).on('load resize scroll', function(){
    
$('.anim').each(function(){
    if ($(this).isInViewport()){
        $(this).addClass('added')
    }else{
        $(this).removeClass('added')
    }
})

function scrollClass(dir){
    console.log(dir)
$('.anim').each(function(){
    $(this).removeClass('up down')
    $(this).addClass(dir)
})
}

var lastScrollTop = null;
$(window).on('scroll', function(event){
   var st = $(window).scrollTop();
   
   if(lastScrollTop !== null){
   if (st > lastScrollTop){
       scrollClass('down')
   }
   if (st < lastScrollTop) {
      scrollClass('up')
   }
   }
   lastScrollTop = st;
});
    
});
</script>
